channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on seekingfourth

item.title: Make my heart pure
item.description: World offered food To cater my desires I went after it To have it all Got exhausted and sick, I fell The trick of desires Played me well Now, I take it as meds Till the disease I cure In Detachment and Love I make my heart pure

item.title: Subtle Links
item.description: Let's meditate on subtle links World, Life Breath is the link Ears, hearing Sound is the link Skin, feeling Air is the link Eyes, seeing Light is the link You, me Love is the link

item.title: Rain of Love
item.description: Endless waters and the boat fragile Thirsty throat which tempts the Mind Heat of Self Blesses with clouds The Grace saves me from turning into dust In the rain of Love I quench my thirst

item.title: Wake up and Rise
item.description: This is my friend That is my foe Through my mind My web grows Wondrous is the illusion That makes me crawl But I see Truth In words of Wise Living through Desires I wake up and Rise

item.title: Wandering Feet
item.description: Going through an illusory maze Colorful walls and, lots to play Some paths are blocked Some go deeper They keep me enchanted to hold me down Leaving the ephemeral I walk with laughter In search of infinite fields My feet wander

item.title: Seeking Fourth
item.description: With every Thought Word and Deed That I allowed Devoid of Love I concealed my Self Blurry to Shine In search of Truth now Within I peek In unwavering Devotion The Fourth I Seek

item.title: Give me the Vision
item.description: Seeing Duality is my inability to see In blinding Darkness and lost in it My seeing is faulty that it sees from eye Give me the vision from Heart to see In Love, In Truth That sets me Free

item.title: Wake me up
item.description: Drunk with desires Deep I sleep Wandering in dream Laugh and weep A voice I hear A soundless sound To wake me up As an alarm Ignorant I am To pay no heed And, what for To snore more!

item.title: Cosmic Silence
item.description: I find it real I try to act It bewilders me Beyond Intellect I give in Now and, rest my thoughts In cosmic Silence My ego drops

item.title: Be One
item.description: All this whatsoever verily is Self Essence of That is in every breath Let us bask in the bliss of Truth Releasing fetters of the Hearts Be One with That in eternal Love!

item.title: I wish
item.description: Sometimes I wish I could wander afar But no destiny awaits to lead me Sometimes I wish my ambitions could rise But no desire erupts to inflame me Sometimes I wish I could fall in love But Love is all That claims me

item.title: Wakeful Sleep
item.description: As long as I sleep under the Veil of Ignorance, I get dissolved into a state where I rest with desires Half awake I project Dream Awake I project Illusion Oh what Adventure it is to take To the state of Wakeful sleep from the sleep of desires

item.title: Ignorant me
item.description: That Supreme Infinite Illumines my mind My mind is inert That breathes in life Expressions I live Memories I scroll Imaginations I weave Filtered through Desires How Ignorant I am I take me as my mind

item.title: Liberated I am
item.description: Whether get it now Or, in many births Whenever we get Truth is only That That only dwells In me and everyone Once I realise This Liberated 'I am'
